dtliExcerpt: Daniel Craig and Ruth Negga are well matched as the murderous couple, but the production, directed by Sam Gold, never finds its own reason for being.
bwwExcerpt: Still, at the end of an often brutal Broadway season that was rightly concerned with harm and heartlessness - in which many shows, including this one, were bedeviled by illness and delays - I liked Gold's showing us that in times of distress and violence people should remember to care for one anothe...
